short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play 3D Free Kick game right in your web-browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our 3D Free Kick game extension is here for you. This game is easy and for everyone who loves soccer. You can play it in your browser, no need to download anything. Just click and play.

In this game you take free kicks and try to score. The game looks real with 3D graphics, it feels like youâ€™re on the field. You can choose different angles and try to score in different ways. The controls are simple and easy to use. Just aim, set power and kick the ball.

As you progress, the game gets harder. You'll face tougher goalies and more difficult angles. This keeps the game interesting.

Install 3D Free Kick game extension now and start scoring!

Feel free to leave a review or share it with friends if you enjoy the game. Your feedback helps us improve and make it even better.
